AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: child of M'aiq
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] father was also called [PAWN_nameDef]. As was [PAWN_nameDef] father's father. At least, that's what their father said.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: child racer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: From the moment they could walk, [PAWN_nameDef]â€™s parents pushed them to participate in races. They would always lose to the senche, but kept trying anyhow. Eventually they got injured during a race and their knees were never the same.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wandering liar
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: "[PAWN_nameDef] knows much, tells some. [PAWN_nameDef] knows many things others do not. [PAWN_nameDef] used to travel alone, but he has grown accustomed to joining their friends.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bone collector
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: With their own bones aching, [PAWN_nameDef] sought comfort in the bones of others. They would scavenge for freshly deceased carcasses, cleaning out the bones and putting them on shelves, proud of their collection. Sometimes their pet cat would eat one, much to their dismay.
